instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message:
Have a 820-2915 that already has a new 2017 GPU before I received it. Has a power problem with PPBUS_G3H. When R5410 is soldered I have short on PPBUS_G3H with no fan spin but when it is removed short gone and board powers up but no video. Tried replacement R5410 but no change

Can this be caused by shorted GPU since R5410 is on GPU power rail?

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message:
Discard GPU power supply first.
If you are lucky enough, could be only bad Q8950...

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message:
Replaced Q8950 and short still remained. Removed GPU and short was gone.

Replaced GPU from SEE-IC and short returned.

Is short inside the board at this point??

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message:
How can be the short inside board, if disappeared when you removed the GPU?

L8920 has very low value to ground because of GPU; this is normal of course.
But such low value is practically short on PPBUS_G3H, when Q8950 is shorted D-S.

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message: D-S?? = drain to source on the mosfet (i would guess he is saying?)

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message: replaced Q8950 and Q8951 and short was gone. board powered on for a few seconds and turned off again. Short returned. What to try next

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message:
Q8950 got shorted again.
Replace Q8950/51 and U8900 at same time.
Be sure C8956 is OK; check its traces.

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message:
Replaced Q8950/51 and U8900 at the same time and short returned as soon as board powered up.

C8956 traces good

threads.title: 820-2915 ppbus_g3h short
threads.message:
Which is the exact value of that short, on the GPU core rail?
004-009 on diode mode is normal for that board, I think.
A pure short there could kill Q8950 once powered up, and same short will pass through it untill PPBUS_G3H.
